siteMetadata.title: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a product manager, developer and designer from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
Google’s downtime caused a 40% drop in global traffic:

That’s huge. As internet users, our reliance on google.com being up is huge.

This is way more dangerous than any proprietary software. At least, you can still use your software even if it is discontinued.

frontmatter.title: Google
frontmatter.excerptLine: Google’s downtime caused a 40% drop in global traffic.
